short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks your progress in various daily games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keeps track of your daily games and remembers your history.

Highlights
 - Choose the games you play regularly to include.
 - Access your selected games at a click from the toolbar.
 - Review your completion history for your selected games.

Supported Games
 - Wordle
 - Connections
 - Strands
 - The NYT Mini Crossword
 - The NYT Crossword
 - Sudoku (Easy, Medium and Hard difficulty)
 - Spelling Bee
 - Letter Boxed
 - Vertex
 - Time Guessr
 - Travle
 - Countrydle
 - EOGuesser
 - Geodle
